GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
HSI: omap_ssi_core: fix possible memory leak in ssi_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit ae2eb995abb90d07a43e9d5cdc22fd0a41ccf174, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit b209e047bc743247f74ce79e8827ae1ed556bae0. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: HSI: omap_ssi_core: fix possible memory leak in ssi_probe()
OSV.details:
